1   package com.googlecode.t7mp.steps.external;
2   
3   import java.io.File;
4   import java.io.FileFilter;
5   import java.io.IOException;
6   import java.util.UUID;
7   
8   import org.apache.commons.io.FileUtils;
9   import org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact;
10  import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
11  import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
12  
13  import com.googlecode.t7mp.AbstractT7Mojo;
14  import com.googlecode.t7mp.TomcatSetupException;
15  import com.googlecode.t7mp.steps.Context;
16  import com.googlecode.t7mp.steps.Step;
17  import com.googlecode.t7mp.steps.deployment.MyArtifactResolver;
18  import com.googlecode.t7mp.util.ZipUtil;
19  
20  /**
21   * 
22   * 
23   * @author jbellmann
24   *
25   */
26  public class ResolveTomcatStep implements Step {
27  	
28  	public static final String TOMCAT_GROUPID = "com.googlecode.t7mp";
29  	public static final String TOMCAT_ARTIFACTID = "tomcat";
30  	public static final String TOMCAT_TYPE = "zip";
31  	
32  
33  	protected AbstractT7Mojo mojo;
34  	protected MyArtifactResolver myArtifactResolver;
35  	protected Log logger;
36  	
37  	@Override
38  	public void execute(Context context) {
39  		this.mojo = context.getMojo();
40  		this.myArtifactResolver = new MyArtifactResolver(context.getMojo());
41  		this.logger = context.getMojo().getLog();
42  		String version = context.getMojo().getTomcatVersion();
43  		File unpackDirectory = null;
44  		try {
45  			Artifact artifact = resolveTomcatArtifact(version + "-SNAPSHOT");
46  			unpackDirectory = getUnpackDirectory();
47  			ZipUtil.unzip(artifact.getFile(), unpackDirectory);
48  			copyToTomcatDirectory(unpackDirectory);
49  		} catch (MojoExecutionException e) {
50  			logger.error(e.getMessage(), e);
51  			throw new TomcatSetupException(e.getMessage(), e);
52  		} catch (IOException e) {
53  			logger.error(e.getMessage(), e);
54  			throw new TomcatSetupException(e.getMessage(), e);
55  		}finally{
56  			if(unpackDirectory != null){
57  				try {
58  					FileUtils.deleteDirectory(unpackDirectory);
59  				} catch (IOException e) {
60  					logger.error("Could not delete tomcat upack directory : " + unpackDirectory.getAbsolutePath());
61  					logger.error(e.getMessage(), e);
62  				}
63  			}
64  		}
65  	}
66  	
67  	private void copyToTomcatDirectory(File unpackDirectory) throws IOException {
68  		File[] files = unpackDirectory.listFiles(new FileFilter() {
69  			@Override
70  			public boolean accept(File file) {
71  				return file.isDirectory();
72  			}
73  		});
74  		// should only be one
75  		FileUtils.copyDirectory(files[0], this.mojo.getCatalinaBase());
76  	}
77  
78  	protected Artifact resolveTomcatArtifact(String tomcatVersion) throws MojoExecutionException{
79  		Artifact artifact = myArtifactResolver.resolve(TOMCAT_GROUPID,
80  												TOMCAT_ARTIFACTID,
81  												tomcatVersion,
82  												null,
83  												TOMCAT_TYPE,
84  												Artifact.SCOPE_COMPILE);
85  		return artifact;
86  	}
87  	
88  	
89  	protected File getUnpackDirectory(){
90  		File tempDir = new File(System.getProperty("java.io.tmpdir"));
91  		File upackDirectory = new File(tempDir, UUID.randomUUID().toString());
92  		upackDirectory.mkdirs();
93  		return upackDirectory;
94  	}
95  
96  }
